# `pysubebm`


## Installation

```bash
pip install git+https://github.com/noxtoby/awkde
pip install git+https://github.com/hongtaoh/ucl_kde_ebm
pip install git+https://github.com/hongtaoh/pySuStaIn
```


```bash
pip install pysubebm
```
